reviewText: Good dvd. About an hour long. My son loves this movie! Arrived very quickly!

I bought it for my 3 yr old grandson because he was interested when he saw the commercial in another movie. He barely watched to the end and every time I ask him if he wants to watch it he says "no thank you" . I think kids are the best judges of everything so that's why I gave this movie(I bought two by the way) one lonely star:(
Can we watch it?  Yes we can!  A few BTB stories, my son likes them all.  Makes long car rides easier.
